channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Mud in Ukraine: how spring and fall conditions have affected armies fighting in the region. https://t.co/kfynzyhWYJ
Using a New Cyber Tool, Westerners Have Been Texting Russians About the War in Ukraine. https://t.co/XAFXdNoW9q
@kidehen exactly
Preparing for Putin's Defeat. https://t.co/6Zf5MX352A
This is what you get when your president is a comedia. Great fucking messaging. https://t.co/g5emJ7fI5f

When will Russia attack us through our network? I don't think they're going to bother attacking Ukraine specifically. I've always assumed they have the ability to knock our banking system offline, maybe even erase all the money records. Imagine the chaos that would result.
imho, they would wait until we're all really confused, and fighting with each other. Really going at it.
And then boom, all our communication goes away.
We will go crazy.
They can kick back and watch. https://t.co/zvpWxJezC0
I have an idea what it will feel like because where I live we've had three days recently when the net was down.
One two-day outage and a single-day outage.
You have no idea how addicted you are on this until it's gone.
They'll wait until they want to do something we can't see. As in "they never knew what hit them."
The thing to do is pray this is wrong and they don't have that ability.
All this thought about they'll go for Lithuania next or Poland, as if this were the 1940s.
It's not the 1940s.
They'll go right to the target -- the good old US of A.

Think about it, how is Ukraine doing such a great job of making sure they aren't forgotten. Their president is a comedian. It would be great if Biden had comedian friends. Let them explain what's going on. Let Biden do the behind the scenes stuff, he's doing that well.

@AlterweiserMan7 @Kasparov63 it's certainly a possibility. maybe they figure the US would never strike first. or maybe putin has terminal cancer and doesn't give a fuck. hard to see china going along with it, either way. china isn't losing like russia is, they're ascendent.
@PaulRieckhoff @Kasparov63 yes that's exactly what that sentence meant.

2013: One great thing about the demise of Google Reader. https://t.co/Nt4PVoXerR
I have discovered there is no limit to the amount of disrespect I have for Google Reader. üòÄ
https://t.co/Rl53R1xvGu
Now Kasparov is entering US politics in either a very naive way or he has an agenda other than preventing a capitulation by the US to Russia. https://t.co/jJ2AM1LelV
An addendum to my spec for how I'd do a new hypothetical feed reader. https://t.co/fzrApi0XfY
@nilofer i don't have a good answer to that question. i guess i had more hope that people would pitch in and do stuff for the good of everyone more than they do.
To hell with WWIII -- we should protect Ukraine against the attacks from Russia. Agree or disagree?
The Ukraine Dilemma. https://t.co/S4wTviyjf1
Are you famous?
